about_the_game:
Welcome to Torn Apart, the ultimate social deduction prototype that will test your skills in survival and betrayal. Gather your friends and get ready to defend an camp against a horde of zombies.



In Torn Apart, you can play with up to 8 players, where one player is secretly chosen as the traitor. The traitor's mission is to kill the other players and sabotage the group's efforts to survive the zombie apocalypse. It's up to the rest of the group to work together, identify the traitor, and prevent the farm from falling to the undead. The game is set in a post-apocalyptic world where the last survivors are fighting for their lives. As a member of the group, you'll need to gather resources, fortify your defenses, and be on the lookout for any signs of treachery. Keep your eyes open and your wits about you, because the traitor could be anyone.

But beware, the zombies won't wait for you to figure out who the traitor is. They'll keep coming in waves, and each one will be more difficult to fend off than the last. You'll need to work quickly and efficiently to stay alive. Rebuild your fences every round and make sure no zombie is able to catch you!
With its intense gameplay, challenging mechanics, and thrilling social deduction elements, Torn Apart is the perfect game for anyone who loves strategy, survival, and a good mystery. Can you survive the zombie apocalypse and uncover the traitor before it's too late? The fate of the farm rests in your hands.

Torn Apart features a charming low-poly art style that brings the post-apocalyptic world to life. The game's characters are designed with a cute and quirky aesthetic, which makes them stand out in a sea of dark and serious zombie games.We wanted to create a unique visual experience that captures the essence of survival and teamwork while still being visually appealing. The low-poly characters add to the game's charm, making it a game that you'll want to play again and again.

So come and experience the world of Torn Apart with its delightful low-poly characters and distinctive art style. We're sure that you'll fall in love with the game's aesthetic, just as we have. As a special treat, we want to let you know that the Torn Apart prototype is completely free! We want everyone to have the chance to experience the game's unique blend of social deduction and survival gameplay, and we're excited to see what you think. Not only can you play Torn Apart for free, but you can also invite all your friends to join in on the fun. That's right - you and up to 7 friends can play Torn Apart together without any cost.

And we didn't stop there! We also added proximity voice chat into the game, which means that you can communicate with your friends in real-time and really immerse yourself in the game's world. Talk tactics, share intel, and strategize to take down the zombie horde and uncover the traitor. So what are you waiting for? Download Torn Apart today and play with all your friends for free, using the built-in proximity voice chat. We can't wait to hear your thoughts and feedback on the game!

Please note that Torn Apart is currently in the prototype phase, and we're excited to hear your feedback to help us improve the game. We want to ensure that Torn Apart meets the expectations of players like you and becomes a game that everyone can enjoy. We believe that Torn Apart has the potential to be a great social deduction game, and with your help, we can fine-tune the game mechanics, balance, and overall experience to make it the best it can be. Your feedback and suggestions are valuable to us, and we encourage you to share them with us.

So join the fight against the undead and take on the challenge of surviving in Torn Apart. Play with your friends, uncover the traitor, and defend the old farm against the zombie horde. Help us shape this game into something great!

If you want more of this game, we'll make it happen. Let your voice be heard and help shape the future of this exciting and unique gaming experience. We thrive on your feedback and we want to create something special with your help!
